Links go to online version. Locally-runnable files are in the `training/` folder.

- [Categorization](https://utdata.shinyapps.io/jedr-categorization/): When you need to rename values in your data, perhaps to create a new categorization schema. 
- [Manage dates](https://utdata.shinyapps.io/jedr-manage-dates/): When you need help parsing dates or making useful date parts for grouping.
